description: Laundry League. An exciting startup that is uber-izing at home laundry tasks.

prompts.companyDetail: We operate a online marketplace to hire gig workers to come into your home and do laundry for you. There's a new competitor that's starting up. It's very important we outpace their ability to ship marketplace features.
priorities: Reduce friction points related to servicing customer security questions
Ensure the board we have best in class security
additionalDetail: We are cloud native and run everything in AWS
Our coding language of choice is Go
We currently have 10 engineering and 50 non-engineering employees.
We prefer SAAS over open source solutions.
